It’s also important to drink plenty 
of	fluid.	Aim	for	at	least	1.2	litres	
(six to eight glasses) each day. 
It’s a good idea to have a drink 
and a healthy snack beside 
you when you settle down to 
breastfeed. Water, milk and 
unsweetened fruit juices are all 
good choices.
To	find	out	more	about	healthy	
eating, go to 
pha.site/healthy-eating
